summary: A Quaker colony tries to save the giant sequoias from a timber baron.
cast: Kirk Douglas|Eve Miller|Patrice Wymore|Edgar Buchanan|John Archer|Alan Hale Jr.|Roy Roberts|Charles Meredith|Harry Cording|Ellen Corby|Mel Archer|John Barton|Arthur Berkeley|Lilian Bond|Chet Brandenburg|Sue Casey|William Challee|Lane Chandler|Bud Cokes|Ben Frommer|Frank Hagney|Michael Jeffers|Fred Kelsey|Jack Kenny|Johnny Kern|Jack Low|Kathy Marlowe|Michael McHale|Bill McLean|Art Millan|Frank Mills|Kansas Moehring|Artie Ortego|Jack Perry|Vici Raaf|Buddy Roosevelt|Lester Sharpe|Elizabeth Slifer|Ray Spiker|Ann Stuart|Sailor Vincent|Duke Watson
director: Director: Felix E. Feist (as Felix Feist)
title: La ley de la fuerza
